page.title: 15A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content:
A NORMAL SUNDAY STARTS OFF WITH A LIE-IN UNTIL 9.30 AND THEN A RUSH TO GET READY FOR CHURCH WHICH TAKES UP MOST OF THE MORNING(10.30-12.00). THEN WE GO FOR A SWIM. THEN WE HAVE OUR SUNDAY LUNCH WHICH CONSISTS OF: { GRAVY { CHICKEN/ROAST BEEF { YORKSHIRE PUDDING { VEGTABLES { ROAST POTATOES ETC. THE AFTERNOON IS SPENT EITHER WALKING ,WATCHING THE T.V. OR PLAYING A GAME OF CRICKET IN THE BACK GARDEN. WE ONLY HAVE A SMALL MEAL AT DINNER TIME AND THEN WE SIT BACK AND WATCH THE T.V. OR THE REST OFF THE EVENING.
{G. TOONE
